list_variables.description: The IP (IPv4) address of a domain name server. You can specify up to four addresses.
list_variables.name: DomainNameServers

list_variables.description: The IP address (IPv4) of a NetBIOS name server. You can specify up to four addresses.
list_variables.name: NetbiosNameServers

list_variables.description: An integer value indicating the NetBIOS node type:
list_variables.name: NetbiosNodeType
list_variables.required: Required if NetBiosNameServers is specified;                   optional otherwise.

list_variables.description: The IP address (IPv4) of a Network Time Protocol (NTP) server. You can specify up to four                   addresses.
list_variables.name: NtpServers

variables.description: A domain name of your choice.
variables.name: DomainName

variables.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this resource.
variables.name: Tags
